title: Calories in Half a Watermelon
meta_description: Discover calories in half a watermelon—about 750 kcal for a medium size—plus carbs, sugars, full nutrition facts, and preparation tweaks for better meals.
assumptions: Medium seedless watermelon; half yields ~2.5 kg (5.5 lbs) edible flesh; raw, fresh, no rind or seeds included in nutrition.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and exact portion (edible flesh weight). Larger or smaller watermelons change totals; consult fresh produce info.

quick_answer.text: Half a medium watermelon provides about 750 kcal, mainly from hydrating carbs and natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in half a watermelon?
faqs.a: Around 750 kcal for a medium half (~2.5 kg edible flesh).

faqs.q: Is half a watermelon high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 155 g of natural sugars, but it's low-calorie due to high water content.

faqs.q: What are the macros for half a watermelon?
faqs.a: 189 g carbs (10 g fiber), 15 g protein, 3.8 g fat, totaling 750 kcal.

faqs.q: Does watermelon have any fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Minimal fat (3.8 g total, mostly unsaturated) and 0 mg cholesterol in half.

faqs.q: How does watermelon size affect calories in half?
faqs.a: Larger watermelons increase calories proportionally; small half may be ~400 kcal.
